title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 190.2 - Official signs and structures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 190.2 - Official signs and structures

State Regulations
(a) No
person shall deface, mutilate or destroy any department sign, structure, barrier or object. (b) No person
shall throw, dump, deposit or place or cause to be thrown, dumped, deposited or
placed on or in any department lands or structures any refuse, trash, garbage, rubbish, litter or any nauseous or offensive matter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
190.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
